EXTENDED DOCUMENT OBJECT MODEL REVISION HISTORY

11.05.2010
Release of "Alternative Document Object Model 4.3.3".

07.01.2010
Uses clauses modified to reflect changes in the underlying Open XML Utilities Library.

05.11.2009
TDtdModel.RemoveAttributeDecl bug fixed: Attribut declaration collections with more than one item are no longer deleted unintentionally.  Thanks to  "Ciuly" for notification.
Release of "Alternative Document Object Model 4.3.2".

23.02.2009
Release of "Alternative Document Object Model 4.3.1". 

22.02.2009
TXmlSimpleInputSource (and derived classes): In the constructors AEncoding parameter changed from WideString to string. InputEncoding property changed from WideString to string.
TXmlInputSource.XmlEncoding and XmlVersion property changed from WideString to string.
TXmlOutputSource.XmlEncoding property changed from WideString to string.
TXmlStreamBuilder.CurrentEncoding and DefaultEncoding property changed from WideString to string.
TDomToXmlParser.WriteToStream and WriteToString functions: Encoding parameter changed from WideString to string.

28.12.2008
TXmlOutputSource.UseByteOrderMark property added.
TXmlOutputSource.WriteByteOrderMark function added.
TXmlStreamBuilder internally modified.
TDtdValidationAgent.ValidateDTD internally modified.

19.12.2008
TDtdValidationAgent.SendErrorNotification bug fixed.
TXmlCustomReader.SendErrorNotification bug fixed.
TXmlToDomParser.SendErrorNotification bug fixed.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.SendErrorNotification bug fixed.

18.12.2008
TXmlSimpleInputSource internally modified.
TXmlInputSource internally modified.
TXmlDtdDetailPETokenizer.CreateInternalInputSource internally modified.
TXmlOutputSource.Encoding property added.
TXmlOutputSource.CodecClass property removed. Use Encoding property instead.
TXmlStreamBuilder.CurrentCodecClass property removed.  Use CurrentEncoding property instead.
TXmlStreamBuilder.DefaultCodecClass property removed.  Use DefaultEncoding property instead.
TXmlSimpleInputSource (and derived classes): In all constructors ACodecClass parameter replaced with AEncoding parameter.
TXmlToDomParser.ParseResource function modified: CodecClass parameter replaced with Encoding parameter.

17.12.2008
TDomPERepository internally modified.
TDomPERepository.Delete function added.
TDomOwnerNamedNodeMap class removed.
TDomCustomNodeClass class type removed.
TDomErrorClass class type removed.
TXmlSignalClass class type removed.
TXmlSignal.CloneSignal internally modified.
TDomXPathResultClass class type removed.
TXPathExpression.AcquireXPathResult function removed. Use one of the ResultAs... functions instead.

13.12.2008
Compiler directives modified.
Release of "Alternative Document Object Model 4.2.1".

11.12.2008
TDomBaseComponent.XDOMVersion function renamed to ADOMVersion.
Package renamed into "Alternative Document Object Model (ADOM)".  Source code and documentation modified accordingly.
Release of "Alternative Document Object Model 4.2.0".

06.12.2008
TXmlCustomReader (and derived classes): OnError event removed. Instead associate the Reader with a TDomImplementation component and use the TDomImplementation.OnError event.
TDomErrorNotifyEvent class removed.
TXmlCustomReader (and derived classes): ErrorReportingEnabled property added. Classes modified accordingly.
TXmlCustomParser (and derived classes): ErrorReportingEnabled property added. Classes modified accordingly.
TDtdValidationAgent.ErrorReportingEnabled property added. Methods internally modified accordingly.
TXmlDomBuilder.ErrorReportingEnabled property added. ProcessSignal procedure internally modified accordingly.

03.12.2008
TDomAttr.CreateNS constructor modified: Condition for ENamespace_Err tightened.
TDomAttr.Prefix property modified: Condition for ENamespace_Err tightened.
TDomElement.SetAttributeNS function modified: Condition for ENamespace_Err tightened.
TDomElement.CreateNS constructor modified: Condition for ENamespace_Err tightened.
TDomElement.Prefix property modified: Condition for ENamespace_Err tightened.
TDomXPathAxisNameNamespace.GetAxisNodeSnapshot modified: 'xmlns' removed from the list of predefined namespaces (only 'xml' remains).
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 4.1.8".

02.12.2008
TXmlErrorType and ET_WARNINGS: ET_XML_SPACE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_ENUMERATED_TYPE, ET_XML_SPACE_ATTRIBUTE_ERRONEOUS_VALUE_DECLARED, ET_XML_SPACE_ATTRIBUTE_ERRONEOUS_VALUE_SPECIFIED type added.
TDtdValidationAgent.ValidateDTD procedure modified: Tests for ET_XML_SPACE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_ENUMERATED_TYPE and ET_XML_SPACE_ATTRIBUTE_ERRONEOUS_VALUE_DECLARED implemented.
TXmlAttributeSignal.CheckWellformedness procedure modified: Test for ET_XML_SPACE_ATTRIBUTE_ERRONEOUS_VALUE_SPECIFIED implemented.
TXmlDocTokenizer.Next procedure modified: XML 1.0, 5th ed. character range works for entity references now.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer.IncludePERefsInLiteral function modified: XML 1.0, 5th ed. character range works for parameter entity references now.
TXmlElementCMTokenizer.Next procedure modified: Excepts full character range according to XML 1.0, 5th ed. now.
TDomXPathTokenizer.Read procedure modified: XPath excepts full character range according to XML 1.0, 5th ed. now.

30.11.2008
TXmlAttrValueTokenizer.Create modified. BOM duplicates in external parsed entities are treated correctly now.
TStandardResourceResolver.AcquireStreamFromUri internally modified.
TXmlErrorType and ET_WARNINGS: ET_FRAGMENT_IDENTIFIER_IN_SYSTEM_IDENTIFIER, ET_SYSTEM_IDENTIFIER_IS_NOT_URI_REFERENCE and ET_UNPARSED_ENTITY_REFERENCED_IN_ENTITY_DECLARATION added.
TDtdValidationAgent.ValidateDTD modified: Checks for invalid system identifiers and unparsed entity referenced in entity declaration added.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.ParseDocTypeDecl modified: Checks for invalid system identifiers added.
TXmlStandardDtdReader: XmlErrorDetected and XmlFatalErrorDetected properties added.
TDtdToDtdModelParser: XmlErrorDetected and XmlFatalErrorDetected properties added. ParseExtSubset and ParseIntSubset procedures internally modified.

29.11.2008
TDtdValidationAgent.ValidateDTD modified. Bug fixed.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 4.1.7".

20.11.2008
TXmlStandardDocReader.Parse internally modified.

28.09.2008
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 4.1.6".

31.08.2008
TDomElement.SetPrefix and TDomAttr.SetPrefix bug (with side effects on other prefix manipulating methods) fixed. Setting a prefix to an empty string is permitted now.  (Thanks to Christoph Roeper and Tor Helland for notification.)

07.08.2008
Compiler conditional checks for Delphi 2009 added.
TStandardResourceResolver.AcquireStreamFromUri internally modified.
TXmlInputSource.CheckEncoding method internally modified.
TXmlStreamBuilder; SetDefaultEncoding, WriteStartDocumentSignal, WriteStartDocumentFragmentSignal, WriteStartExtDtdSignal methods internally modified.

10.07.2008
TXmlStreamBuilder.WriteByteOrderMark bug fixed for UCS-2 and UCS-4 encoding.
Made compatible with the Utility Library 2.0.13.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 4.1.5".

03.12.2007
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 4.1.4".

Sept./Nov. 2006
Porting XDOM to Delphi for .NET.
TXmlSourceCode.Add, Insert and Remove methods: type of Item parameter changed from Pointer to TXmlSourceCodePiece.
TDomXPathSyntaxNodeStack.Push function changed to procedure.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer.ProcessPendingAttrDef: bug fixed.
TXmlToDomParser.ParseWithContext: bug fixed when Action = ACTION_REPLACE_CHILDREN.
TDomError constructors made static.
TDomErrorClass class removed.
TDomError.CloneError function internally modified.
TUtilsNoRefCount class shifted from the external MiscUtils unit into XDOM.
IDomLocator interface calling convention changed (stdcall removed).
TDomNode.Supports function removed.

29.10.2006
TXmlDomBuilder.ProcessSignal bug fixed: Input encoding information is now correctly recorded in Document nodes.
TDtdValidationAgent.ParseWideString private function internally modified.
TDomNode.CheckTypeAllowed protected function modified: If an EHierarchy_Request_Err exceptions in raised in the AppendChild, InsertBefore, or ReplaceChild method when a document fragment is involved, then the original node hierarchy will remain intact.  A side effect is, that for the TXmlToDomParser.ParseWithContext method with the Action parameter set to ACTION_REPLACE, if an exception is raised the context node will always remain in place.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 4.1.3".

24.09.2006
TXmlParserAction class of constants added.
TXmlToDomParser.ParseWithContext function added.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 4.1.2".

23.09.2006
TXmlSimpleInputSource class: New overloaded Create constructors added.
TXmlInputSource class: New overloaded Create constructors added.
TXmlToDomParser.StreamToDom, StringToDom, and WideStringToDom functions removed. Use the XmlInputSourceToDom function instead or the TXmlToDomParserEx class from the XdomParserEx.pas unit included in the 'add_ons' directory.
TXmlToDomParser.Parse, ParseFile, and ParseResource functions added.
TXmlToDomParser.FileToDom function removed. Use the ParseFile function instead. 
TXmlToDomParser.UriToDom function removed. Use the ParseResource function instead.
TXmlToDomParser.XmlInputSourceToDom function removed. Use the Parse function instead.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.ExtSubsetStreamToDtdModel, ExtSubsetStringToDtdModel, ExtSubsetWideStringToDtdModel, IntSubsetStreamToDtdModel, EIntSubsetStringToDtdModel, and IntSubsetWideStringToDtdModel functions removed. Use the ExtSubsetXmlInputSourceToDtdModel or IntSubsetXmlInputSourceToDtdModel function respectively instead.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.ExtSubsetXmlInputSourceToDtdModel function renamed to ParseExtSubset.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.IntSubsetXmlInputSourceToDtdModel function renamed to ParseIntSubset.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.ParseDocTypeDecl function modified: InclDecl parameter added.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.ParseExternalSubset function renamed to ParseExtSubset. 
TXmlStandardDtdReader.ParseInternalSubset function renamed to ParseIntSubset.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.ParseIntSubset function modified: InputSource parameter type changed from TXmlSimpleInputSource to TXmlInputSource.

17.09.2006.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.TargetDtdModel property internally modified.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.ExtSubsetXMLInputSourceToDtdModel and IntSubsetXMLInputSourceToDtdModel procedures added.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.ExtSubsetStreamToDtdModel and IntSubsetStreamToDtdModel procedures internally modified.
TXmlToDomParser.SourceCodeToDom function removed. Use WideStringToDom instead.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.ExtSubsetSourceCodeToDtdModel and IntSubsetSourceCodeToDtdModel procedures removed. Use WideString parsing methods instead.
TXmlInputSource.Create and EvaluateXmlOrTextDecl bug fixed. Mismatch of specified encoding and XML encoding declaration in the stream raises no longer an exception.
TXmlOutputSource inherits from TUtilsCustomOutputStream now.
TXmlCustomTokenizer.GetEndColumnNumber and GetStartColumnNumber internally modified.
TXmlDoctypeDeclTokenizer.GetEndColumnNumber and GetStartColumnNumber internally modified.

11.03.2006
TXmlStandardDocReader.WriteDoctype procedure bug fixed: Line numbers of error reports corrected.
TXmlStandardDomReader internally modified.
TDomImplementation.ResolveResourceAsWideString internally modified.
NAMESPACE_ABSTRACT_SCHEMA_MODE
Namespace abstract schema model class removed: TDomASModelNS, TDtdValidationAgentNS, TDomASAttributeDeclNS, TDomASElementDeclNS, TDomASEntityDeclNS, TDomASNotationDeclNS.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 4.1.1".

06.11.2005
TDomXPathFunctionCall, TDomXPathVariableReference, and TDomXPathNameTest classes: protected LookupNamespaceURI function shifted to TDomXPathSyntaxNode class.
TDomXPathSyntaxTree.LookupNamespaceURI protected function added.
TXPathExpression.LookupNamespaceURI protected function added.
TDomXPathLookupNamespaceURIEvent event type added.
TXPathExpression.OnLookupNamespaceURI event added.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.27".

16.10.2005
TXmlErrorType and ET_ERRORS: ET_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MODEL_MISMATCH_WITH_CDATA_SECTION_WHERE_ELEMENT_ONLY, ET_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MODEL_MISMATCH_WITH_CHILD_ELEMENT_TYPE, ET_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MODEL_MISMATCH_WITH_ELEMENT_WHERE_PCDATA_ONLY, and ET_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MODEL_MISMATCH_WITH_PCDATA_WHERE_ELEMENT_ONLY constants added.
TXmlErrorType and ET_ERRORS: ET_ELEMENT_WITH_ILLEGAL_ELEMENT_CONTENT and ET_ELEMENT_WITH_ILLEGAL_MIXED_CONTENT constans removed.
TXmlErrorType and ET_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_INVALID_ENCODING_NAME, ET_INVALID_VERSION_NUMBER, ET_INVALID_NOTATION_NAME_IN_NOTATION_DECL, ET_INVALID_NOTATION_NAME_IN_ENTITY_DECL, ET_MISSING_ENTITY_VALUE_IN_ENTITY_DECL, ET_MISSING_ENTITY_VALUE_IN_PARAMETER_ENTITY_DECL, ET_INVALID_ENTITY_NAME_IN_ENTITY_DECL, ET_INVALID_ENTITY_NAME_IN_PARAMETER_ENTITY_DECL, ET_INVALID_ENTITY_VALUE_IN_ENTITY_DECL, ET_INVALID_ENTITY_VALUE_IN_PARAMETER_ENTITY_DECL, ET_INVALID_ROOT_ELEMENT_NAME_IN_DOCTYPE_DECL, ET_ANY_KEYWORD_NOT_ALLOWED, ET_KEYWORD_EMPTY_NOT_ALLOWED, ET_KEYWORD_PCDATA_NOT_ALLOWED, ET_INVALID_CONTENT_MODEL_TOKEN_IN_ELEMENT_DECL, ET_MALFORMED_CONTENT_MODEL_IN_ELEMENT_DECL and ET_INVALID_ELEMENT_NAME_IN_ELEMENT_DECL constants added.
TXmlErrorType and ET_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_INVALID_DOCTYPE constant removed.
Some parsing and validating methods modified to report more specific XML errors.
TXmlToDomParser: StreamToDom, UriToDom, StringToDom, and WideStringToDom functions: CodecClass and InclDecl parameters added.
TDtdToDtdModelParser: ExtSubsetStreamToDtdModel, ExtSubsetStringToDtdModel, and ExtSubsetWideStringToDtdModel functions: InclDecl parameter added.
TXmlStandardDomReader.Parse function modified: When attributes are processed, the RelatedNode property of TXmlAttributeSignal objects is set to the attribute node itself, not to its OwnerElement.
TXmlStreamBuilder.WriteAttributeSignal modified: OnBeforeWrite event is now triggered immediately before the attribute name is serialized (instead of being triggered before the whitespace before the attribute).
TXmlNamespaceSignalGenerator.ProcessAttributeSignal bug fixed when processing default namespace attributes.  Thanks to Tor Helland for notification!
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.26".

03.10.2005
TDomASContentModelType replaced with TDtdContentModelType.
TDomASContentType replaced with TDtdContentType.
TDomASEntityType replaced with TDtdEntityType.
TDomASOrigin replaced with TDtdOrigin.
TDomASFrequency replaced with TDtdFrequency.
TDomASObjectType replaced with TDtdObjectType.
TDomASObjectTypeSet replaced with TDtdObjectTypeSet.
TDomNodeTypeSet set of constants removed.  Use TDomWhatToShow instead.
TDomASObject renamed to TDtdObject.
TDomASObjectList renamed to TDtdObjectList.
TDomASNamedObjectMap renamed to TDtdNamedObjectMap.
TDomASContentModel renamed to TDtdContentModel.
TDomASAttDeclCollection renamed to TDtdAttDeclCollection.
IDomLocator interface: GetRelatedASObject function renamed to GetRelatedDtdObject; RelatedASObject property renamed to RelatedDtdObject.  Other classes modified accordingly.
EAS_Wrong_Element_Decl_Err exception class removed.
EASException exception class removed.
EDomstring_Size_Err exception class removed.
EInvalid_Access_Err exception class removed.
TDtdElementDecl.ReplaceContentModel function modified.
TDomASElementDeclNS.ReplaceContentModel function modified.
TXmlErrorType and ET_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_INVALID_NOTATION_TOKEN_IN__ATTRIBUTE_DECL, ET_INVALID_ENUMERATION_TOKEN_IN_ATTRIBUTE_DECL, ET_INVALID_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_IN_ATTRIBUTE_DECL and ET_INVALID_ELEMENT_NAME_IN_ATTRIBUTE_DECL constants added.
Some parsing and validating methods modified to report more specific XML errors.
TXmlAttributeSignal.CheckWellformedness internally modified.
TXmlAttributeDefinitionSignal.CheckWellformedness internally modified.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.25".

02.10.2005
TDomPERepository internally modified.
TDomPEInfoObject internally modified.
TXmlCustomReader.ResolveResource function removed.
TDomImplementation.ResolveResource function renamed to ResolveResourceAsStream.
TDomImplementation.ResolveResourceAsWideString procedure added.  Other classes internally modified accordingly.

01.10.2005
TDtdValidationAgent.BuildDtdModel procedure modified: ResolveExtEntities parameter added.
TDtdValidationAgent.ValidateDocument procedure modified: Opt parameter added.
TDtdValidationAgent.ResolveExtEntities and EntityResolution properties removed.
TDomDocument.ValidationAgent property made public.
TDomDocument.Validate function removed.  Use TDomDocument.ValidationAgent.ValidateDocument instead.
IDomLocator.EndTabsInLine and StartTabsInLine property and corresponding GetEndTabsInLine and GetStartTabsInLine function added.  TDomError, TXmlCustomTokenizer, TXmlDtdDetailPETokenizer, TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer, TXmlDoctypeDeclTokenizer, TXmlSignal classes modified accordingly.  Other classes internally modified accordingly.
TDomImplementation.TabWidth published property removed.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer (and derived classes): TabWidth property removed and Create constructor modified accordingly.
TXmlCustomReader (and derived classes): TabWidth published property removed.
TXmlDtdDetailPETokenizer internally modified.
TXmlInputSource.Create constructor: parameter modified.
TDtdToDtdModelParser: CodecClass parameter added to parsing methods.

25.09.2005
TXmlSimpleInputSource class added.
TXmlInputSource class derived from TXmlSimpleInputSource class now.  Other classes refractored to use TXmlSimpleInputSource instead of TXmlInputSource wherever possible.
TDomXMLDeclType: DT_UNKNOWN constant removed.
TXmlErrorType and ET_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_BYTE_ORDER_MARK_ENCODING_MISMATCH constant added.  
TDtdValidationAgent.ResolveEntity method internally modified.
TDomPEInfoObject.Update method internally modified.
TXmlToDomParser.StreamToDom method internally modified.
TDtdToDtdModelParser.ExtSubsetStreamToDtdModel and IntSubsetStreamToDtdModel methods internally modified.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.24".

24.09.2005
TXmlInputSource class reimplemented.  Methods of other classes internally changed accordingly.  See the manual for details.
TXmlAttrValueTokenizer class reimplemented.  See the manual for details. 
TDomCustomDocument.CalculateNormalizedAttrValue internally modified.
TDtdValidationAgent.NormalizeAttrValueStep1 internally modified.
TDomASEntityDecl.SetReplacementText internally modified.
TXmlElementCMTokenizer class reimplemented.  See the manual for details.
TXmlElementTypeDeclarationSignal.CheckWellformedness internally modified.
TXmlDoctypeDeclTokenizer class reimplemented.  See the manual for details.

18.09.2005
TDomPEInfoObject.Update function changed to procedure.
TDomPERepository.ResolvePE internally modified.
TDtdValidationAgent.ResolveExtEntities property added.
TDtdValidationAgent.BuildDtdModel modified.
TDomDocTypeDeclTreatment class of constants added.
TXmlDomBuilder.DocTypeDeclTreatment property added.
TDomAutoPrepare class of constants removed.
TXmlDomBuilder: AutoPrepare and KeepDocumentTypeDecl properties removed.  Use DocTypeDeclTreatment property instead.
TXmlToDomParser class reimplemented.  See the manual for details.

17.09.2005
TDtdModel modified: Declarations for predefined entities are automatically set; most method names changed.  Other classes modified accordingly.
TDomASAttDeclCollection: Most method names changed.  Other classes modified accordingly.
TDomDocument.PrepareAttributes internally modified.
TDtdValidationAgent internally modified.
TDtdValidationAgent.Prepare function: parameters modified, changed to procedure and renamed to BuildDtdModel.
TDtdValidationAgent.PreparationStatus property shifted to TDtdModel class and made read/write.
TDtdValidationAgent.ValidateDocument procedure changed to function.
TDtdValidationAgent: FatalErrorEncountered and ErrorEncountered properties removed. Use return value of the ValidateDocument function instead.
TDtdToDtdModelParser component added.
TDtdToASParser component removed.  Use TDtdToDtdModelParser instead.
TDomResolveEntityEvent event type modified: AcceptExtEntity parameter added.
TDomPERepository reimplemented.
TDomPERefTreatment class of constants removed.
TXmlStartIntDtdSignal.XmlStandalone property added.
TXmlExternalPEReferenceSignal class added.
TXmlDtdAbstractTokenType: DTD_ABSTRACT_PARAMETER_ENTITY_REF_TOKEN renamed to DTD_ABSTRACT_EXT_PARAMETER_ENTITY_REF_TOKEN
TXmlDtdDetailPETokenizer.PERefTreatment property added.
TXmlDtdDetailPETokenizer.AllowPEsInMarkup and ResolvePEsInDeclSep properties removed.  Use the PERefTreatment property instead.
TXmlDtdDetailPETokenizer.OnResolveEntity event renamed to OnResolveParameterEntity.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer internally modified.
TXmlIntSubsetTokenizer.ResolvePEs property renamed to ResolveExtPEs.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.PERefTreatment property removed.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.ParseInternalSubset: Standalone and ResolveExtPEs parameters added.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.Parseloop procedure modified.
TDomPreparationStatus modified.

11.09.2005
TXmlErrorType and ET_WARNINGS_ERRORS: ET_UNUSABLE_ENTITY_DECL removed.
TDomResolveEntityFunc procedural type added.
TDomASEntityDecl.SetReplacementText internally modified.
TDomASEntityDecl.IsResolved property added.
TDomASEntityDecl.Usability property removed.  Use IsResolved instead.  Other classes changed accordingly.
TDomASEntityDecl.Resolve function modified and renamed to ResolveReplacementText.
TDomASEntityDecl.CheckNoRecursion function added.
TDomASEntityDeclNS.Usability property removed.
TDomASEntityUsability class of constants removed. 
TXmlParameterEntityDeclarationSignal.CheckWellformedness internally modified.
TDomError.Clue parameter added.  Constructors and Clone function modified accordingly.  Clue parameter added to some protected SendErrorNotification procedures of other classes.
TrimSpace function moved into WideStringUtils unit.
TXmlBOMOpt typed constants added.
TXmlStreamBuilder.UseByteOrderMark property modified.  Methods internally changed accordingly.
TDomToXmlParser.UseByteOrderMark property modified.  Methods internally changed accordingly.
TXmlSignal (and derived classes): CheckWellformedness procedure modified.  Methods of other classes changed accordingly.
TXmlStreamBuilder.WriteAttributeSignal modified: Now, no exception is raised on attempts to serialize an attribute outside a tag.
TDomNode.ReferenceDocument renamed to RootDocument.
IDomLocator.Uri property renamed to SystemId; GetUri function renamed to GetSystemId.  Other classes changed accordingly.
TDomError.Uri property renamed to SystemId.
TDtdToASParser.TargetDtdModel property added and Target parameter removed from all functions.  All occurrences in the source code modified accordingly.
TDtdToASParser.ParseDTD function renamed to ParserDocTypeDecl.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.23".

10.09.2005
TXmlErrorType and ET_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_ROOT_NOT_FOUND renamed to ET_ROOT_ELEMENT_NOT_FOUND, ET_NOT_IN_ROOT renamed to ET_NOT_IN_ROOT_ELEMENT, ET_UNCLOSED_CHARREF renamed to ET_UNCLOSED_CHAR_REF, ET_INVALID_CHARREF renamed to ET_INVALID_CHAR_REF, ET_PARAMETER_ENTITY_REF_NOT_ALLOWED constant added.
TXmlStandardDomReader.Parse modified: An EAccessViolation is raised if the specified SourceNode is nil.
TDomEntityReference internally modified.
TXmlDtdDetailPETokenizer.Next internally modified.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer.IncludePERefs internally modified.
TDtdModel.PEsInIntSubset property added. 
TDtdModel.SetASAttributeDecl, RemoveASAttributeDecl, ResolveResource and functions added.
TDtdModel.SetASAttDeclCollection function removed.  Use SetASAttributeDecl instead.
TDtdModel.RemoveASAttDeclCollection function removed.  Use RemoveASAttributeDecl instead.
TDtdModel.DomImplementation property and ResolveResource function removed. 
TDtdModel.OwnerAgent property removed.
TDtdModel.Create constructor modified: AOwner parameter removed.
TDtdValidationAgent partly refactored and a bug fixed.
TXmlCustomReader.ResolveResource function added.
TDomPERepository.ResolveResource function added.
TDomPERepository.DomImplementation property removed.  Use TDomPERepository.OwnerReader.DomImpl instead.
TDomPEInfoObject.Update internally modified.
TDomASEntityDecl.Resolve internally modified.
TXmlAttrValueTokenType class of constants added.
TXmlAttrValueTokenizer class added.
TDomCustomDocument.CalculateNormalizedAttrValue internally modified.
TDomAttr.GetDataType internally modified.
TDomNode.Destroy bug fixed: Associated UserDataEvent handlers are triggered with the correct OT_NODE_DESTROYED Operation parameter now (instead of the wrong OT_NODE_IMPORTED).

04.09.2005
TDomASAttListDecl renamed to TDomASAttDeclCollection.  Other classes modified accordingly.
TDomASAttributeDecl.OwnerAttListDecl property renamed to OwnerCollection.
TDtdModel.FindASAttListDecl function renamed to FindASAttDeclCollection.
TDtdModel.RemoveASAttListDecl function renamed to RemoveASAttDeclCollection.
TDtdModel.SetASAttListDecl function renamed to SetASAttDeclCollection.
TDtdModel.AttListDecls property renamed to AttDeclCollections.
TXmlASBuilder renamed to TXmlDtdModelBuilder.
TXmlDtdModelBuilder.ASModel property renamed to DtdModel.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.22".

03.09.2005
TDomImplementation.HasFeature function removed.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer.CurrentSignal property added.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer: TokenData and TokenName properties removed. Use CurrentSignal property instead.
TDomNotifyWideStringEvent event class added.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer modified.
TXmlStandardDtdReader internally modified.
XmlAnalyseEntityDef procedure removed.
XmlAnalyseNotationDecl procedure removed.
XmlIsolateQuote procedure removed.
TDomError.CreateFromError constructor removed.  Use TDomError.CloneError instead.
TXmlErrorType and ET_ERRORS: ET_UNRESOLVABLE_ENTITY_REFERENCE, ET_UNRESOLVABLE_PARAMETER_ENTITY_REFERENCE removed.
TXmlErrorType: ET_ATTRIBUTE_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND renamed to ET_UNDEFINED_ATTRIBUTE, ET_ELEMENT_TYPE_DECL_NOT_FOUND renamed to ET_UNDEFINED_ELEMENT_TYPE, ET_ENTITY_DECL_NOT_FOUND_VC renamed to ET_UNDEFINED_ENTITY_VC, ET_ENTITY_DECL_NOT_FOUND_WFC renamed to ET_UNDEFINED_ENTITY_WFC, ET_EXTERNAL_SUBSET_NOT_FOUND renamed to ET_UNRESOLVABLE_EXTERNAL_SUBSET, ET_PARAMETER_ENTITY_DECL_NOT_FOUND renamed to ET_UNDEFINED_PARAMETER_ENTITY, ET_REQUIRED_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND renamed to ET_REQUIRED_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_SPECIFIED, ET_TARGET_UNPARSED_ENTITY_NOT_FOUND renamed to ET_UNDEFINED_TARGET_UNPARSED_ENTITY, ET_UNDECLARED_NOTATION_NAME renamed to ET_UNDEFINED_NOTATION, ET_WRONG_DECL_OF_PREDEFINED_ENTITY renamed to ET_PREDEFINED_ENTITY_INCORRECTLY_REDECLARED, ET_SDDECL_YES_BUT_EXT_ATTR_NOT_NORMALIZED renamed to ET_UNNORMALIZED_EXT_ATTR_IN_STANDALONE_DOC, ET_SDDECL_YES_BUT_EXT_ATTR_NOT_SPECIFIED renamed to ET_UNSPECIFIED_EXT_ATTR_IN_STANDALONE_DOC, ET_SDDECL_YES_BUT_WHITESPACE_IN_EXT_ELEMENT_CONTENT renamed to ET_WHITESPACE_IN_EXT_ELEMENT_CONTENT_IN_STANDALONE_DOC.
ET_DOCTYPE_FATAL_ERRORS constant removed.

21.08.2005
TXmlErrorType and ET_ERRORS: ET_PE_NOT_PROPERLY_NESTED_WITH_PARENTHESIZED_GROUP, ET_PE_NOT_PROPERLY_NESTED_WITH_DECL, ET_PE_NOT_PROPERLY_NESTED_WITH_CONDITIONAL_SECTION constants added.
TXmlDtdAbstractTokenType: DTD_ABSTRACT_END_OF_CONDITIONAL_SECTION_TOKEN and DTD_ABSTRACT_START_OF_CONDITIONAL_SECTION_TOKEN replaced with DTD_ABSTRACT_CONDITIONAL_SECTION_TOKEN.
TXmlDtdDetailTokenType class of constants added.
TXmlDtdDetailTokenizer class added.
TDomResolveEntityEvent event class added.
TXmlDtdDetailPETokenizer class added.
TXmlEntityDeclarationSignal modified.
TXmlParameterEntityDeclarationSignal modified.
TDtdModel.SetASEntityDecl modified: BaseUri parameter added.
TDomASEntityDecl.BaseUri property added and constructor changed accordingly.
TDomPEInfoObject.Create modified.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer, TXmlExtSubsetTokenizer, and TXmlIntSubsetTokenizer classes reimplemented.
TXmlDtdTokenType class of constants removed.
TXmlDtdTokenizer class removed.

20.08.2005
TXmlErrorType and ET_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_INVALID_CHARACTER_IN_EXT_ENTITY, ET_XML_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED, ET_PE_BETWEEN_DECLARATIONS, ET_EXT_PARAMETER_ENTITY_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND constants added.
TDomContentspecType class of constants removed.
TXmlElementCMTokenizer.Next bug fixed.
TXmlElementTypeDeclarationSignal.ContentType property removed. Other classes changed accordingly.
TXmlElementTypeDeclarationSignal.CheckWellformedness internally modified.
TDomPEInfoObject modified.
TDomPERepository internally modified.
TXmlInputSource version detection changed. Version '1.0' is the default now, if not version information had been specified.
Parsing and validating classes modified: Attempts to parse or validate XML documents other than of version 1.0 are rejected, now.

25.07.2005
TXmlNamespaceSignalGenerator.CloseStartElement modified. It contained code that was specific vor Delphi 7+.  Thanks to Andy Duggan for notification.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.21".

24.07.2005
TDtdSubsetModel: Location and Hint properties replaced by IntSubsetSysId and ExtSubsetSysId. IsExternal property removed.
TDomASOrigin: AS_PREDEFINED constant added.
TDomASObject.Origin property removed, but implemented again in the derived classes TDomASAttributeDecl, TDomASElementDecl, TDomASEntityDecl, and TDomASNotationDecl.  Constructors of these classes and changed accordingly.
TDtdSubsetModel modified.
TXmlASBuilder.ActivityStatus property added.
TDtdSubsetModel renamed to TDtdModel.
TDtdValidationAgent: InternalSubset and ExternalSubset properties replaced by DtdModel.
TXmlElementTypeDeclarationSignal.ContentType property added.
TXmlElementCMTokenType class of constants added.
TXmlElementCMTokenizer class added.

23.07.2005
TDtdValidationAgent: FatalErrorEncountered and ErrorEncountered properties added. TDtdValidationAgent class modified accordingly.
TdomASEntityDecl.LiteralValue property added and Create constructor modified.
TDtdSubsetModel.SetASEntityDecl function modified.
TXmlErrorType and ET_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_EXT_ENTITY_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND, ET_ENTITY_REFERENCED_BEFORE_DECLARED_WFC constants added.
TXmlErrorType and ET_ERRORS: ET_ENTITY_REFERENCED_BEFORE_DECLARED_VC constant added.
TdomASEntityDecl.resolve modified.
TdomASEntityType class: AS_PREDEFINED_ENTITY constant added.
TdomLocationEvent event class added.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer.OnPEReference event added.
TXmlPEReferenceFoundSignal class added.
TDtdValidationAgent.GetContentType function added.
TdomText.charRefGenerated property added.
TdomText.IsElementContentWhitespace internally modified.
TDtdValidationAgent internally modified.
TXmlStandardDomReader internally modified.
TdomASObject.Key property added.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.20".

17.07.2005
ET_ERRORS and ET_WARNINGS: ET_DOCTYPE_NOT_FOUND constant shifted from ET_ERRORS to ET_WARNINGS.
TXmlErrorType: ET_ENTITY_DECL_NOT_FOUND constant refactored into ET_ENTITY_DECL_NOT_FOUND_VC and ET_ENTITY_DECL_NOT_FOUND_WFC.
TXmlErrorType and ET_ERRORS: ET_SDDECL_YES_BUT_EXT_ATTR_NOT_NORMALIZED, ET_SDDECL_YES_BUT_EXT_ATTR_NOT_SPECIFIED, and ET_SDDECL_YES_BUT_WHITESPACE_IN_EXT_ELEMENT_CONTENT constants added.
TXmlErrorType and ET_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_INVALID_PARAMETER_ENTITY_NAME, ET_SDDECL_YES_BUT_EXT_DECL_ENTITY_REFERENCED constants added.
TdomASAttListDecl class added.
TdomASObjectType: AS_ATTLIST_DECLARATION constant added.
TdomASAttributeDecl class modified.
TdomASElementDecl class modified.
TDtdSubsetModel class modified.
TdomASOrigin class of constants added.
TdomASObject.Origin property added and Create constructor modified.  TdomASContentModel, TdomASAttListDecl, TdomASAttributeDecl, TdomASEntityDecl, TdomASNotationDecl, and TdomASElementDecl changed accordingly. 
TDtdSubsetModel.IsExternal property added and Create constructor modified; other methods changed accordingly.
TXmlASBuilder class internally modified.
TXmlAttributeDefinitionSignal, TXmlElementTypeDeclarationSignal, TXmlEntityDeclarationSignal,and TXmlNotationDeclarationSignal classes: IsDeclaredInPE property added.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer.IsProcessingPE property added.

16.07.2005
TdomASModelCollectionNS renamed to TDtdValidationAgentNS.
TdomASModelCollection completely modified and renamed to TDtdValidationAgent. 
TdomASModel class renamed to TDtdSubsetModel.
TDtdSubsetModel.OwnerCollection property renamed to OwnerAgent.
TdomDocument and TdomDocumentTypeDecl internally modified: Maintenance of the DTDModel (now named ValidationAgent) shifted from TdomDocumentTypeDecl to TdomDocument.
TdomDocumentTypeDecl: preparationStatus property and prepare function shifted to TDtdValidationAgent.
TDomDocument.IDs property removed.  Other classes adapted accordingly.
TDomCustomDocument internally modified.
TdomDocumentTypeDecl: intSubsetStartByteNumber, intSubsetStartCharNumber, intSubsetStartColumn, and intSubsetStartLine properties added.
TDtdToASParser.ParseDTD function modified.
TdomASEntityDecl.ContainsLT property removed.

10.07.2005
TdomAttr.dataType property added. 
TdomASModelCollection.validateElement internally modified.
TdomPieceType: xmlAttribute constant added.
TXmlAttributeSignal added and TXmlStartElementSignal modified. Other classes modified to use TXmlAttributeSignal instead of TXmlStartElementSignal to signal attributes.
TDomDocument.Create bug fixed: IDs.Duplicates changed from dupIgnore to dupError.
TDomDocumentNS.Create bug fixed: IDs.Duplicates changed from dupError to dupIgnore.
TXmlNamespaceSignalGenerator component added.
TXmlStandardDocReader: PrefixMapping and SuppressXmlns properties removed. TXmlStandardDocReader does no longer support namespace signaling. Use it in combination with TXmlNamespaceSignalGenerator instead. 
TXmlStandardDomReader: PrefixMapping, SignalElementID, and SuppressXmlns properties removed. TXmlStandardDomReader does no longer support namespace signaling. Use it in combination with TXmlNamespaceSignalGenerator instead. 

09.07.2005
TDomDocument refactored into TDomCustomDocument, TDomDocument, TDomDocumentNS, and TDomDocumentXPath. Other classes changed accordingly.
TXmlDomBuilder.BuildNamespaceTree property removed.
TdomNode.getReferenceDocument modified, to fix a bug in TdomXPathNamespace.ReferenceDocument.
TXPathExpression.ContextNode modified: The reference document of the context node must be of type TDomDocumentXPath.
TDomDocument.IDs property modified and made puplic.
TXmlStartElementSignal.ID property added.
TXmlStandardDomReader.SignalElementID puplished property added.
TXmlDomBuilder.BuildIDList puplished property added. 
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.19".

05.06.2005
TdomTreePosition class replaced with TdomDocumentPosition.
TdomNode: compareTreePosition function replaced with compareDocumentPosition.
TdomXPathNodeSetResult.sort procedure added.
XPathFunctionId function modified: The result TdomXPathNodeSetResult is sorted, now.
XPathRound function bug fixed: Negative zero is correctly treated, now.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.18".

29.05.2005
TdomCustomASModelNS (and derived classes): DomImplementation constructor parameter removed; DomImplementation property is read-write now.
TdomDocument.ASModelsNS property removed.
TDomImplementation: ASModelsNS property and createASModelNS, freeASModelNS and freeUnusedASModelsNS factory methods removed. Maintainance of TdomASModelNS instances is now the responsibility of the application.

09.04,2005
TdomNode.getUserData and setUserData: bug fixed. Thanks to Serge Voloshenyuk for notification.
TdomNode.appendChild bug fixed. Appending a TdomDocumentFragment node is working correctly now. Thanks to Serge Voloshenyuk for the bug fix. 

03.04.2005
Conditional sections removed, where the compiler flag IGNORE_DOCUMENT_FORMAT is not set.
TdomDocument.prepareAttributes2 bug fixed.
TdomASModelCollection.validateElement bug fixed.
TdomDocumentType class removed. Use TdomDocumentTypeDecl instead. --  All occurences modified accordingly.  In particular: ntDocument_Type_Node constant removed from TdomNodeType. TDomImplementation: createDocument, createDocumentNS methods modified and freeDocumentType method and documentTypes property removed. TdomDocument.create constructor modified. TdomDocument.doctype property removed.
TdomEntity class removed.
TdomNotation class removed.
TdomNodeType: ntDocument_Type_Node, ntEntity_Node, ntNotation_Node constant removed.
TDomImplementation: createDoc, createDocument, and createDocumentNS removed. Use TDomDocument.Create instead.
TDomImplementation.freeDocument removed. Use TDomDocument.Free instead.
TdomDocument: createAttribute, createAttributeNS, createCDATASection, createComment, createDocumentFragment, createDocumentTypeDecl, createElement, createElementNS, createEntityReference, createProcessingInstruction, and createTextNode functions removed. Use the equivalent class constructors instead.

20.02.2005
TdomPEInfoObject.LiteralValue bug fixed: Character references in external parsed entities are no longer expanted (cf. XML 1.0, 3rd ed. spec., sec. 4.5).
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.17".

30.01.2005
TdomError.Create bug fixed. Thanks to Alois Beck for the fix.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.16".

29.01.2005
Delphi 4 package added.

11.12.2004
TdomDocument internally modified.
TdomASModelCollection internally modified.
TdomASModelCollection.ValidateDocument function added.
TdomElement.resolveEntityReferences modified.
TdomAttr.resolveEntityReferences added: Entity references in attributes are now also resolved, if the resolve option is 'erReplace'.
TdomNode (and derived classes): resolveEntityReferences function removed. Use TdomAttr.validate instead.
TdomAttr.lookupNamespaceURI bug fixed.
TdomXPathNameTest.evaluate bug fixed.  Thanks to Tor Helland for providing the fix.
TdomXPathNodeSetResult.setAxisType bug fixed.  Thanks to Tor Helland for notification.
TdomXPathAxisNameFollowingSibling.getAxisNodeSnapshot bug fixed.  Thanks to Tor Helland for providing the fix.
TXmlDomBuilder.processSignal namespace prefix bug fixed.  Thanks to Tor Helland for notification.
TdomNode.hasAttributes bug fixed.  Thanks Ain Valtin for notification.
TdomXPathSyntaxTree.prepare: bug fixed regarding absolute paths in function arguments.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.15".

26.09.2004
TdomASModelCollection.getDataType function added.
TdomASModelCollection internally modified.
TdomAttr.isId property removed. Use TdomASModelCollection.getDataType instead.
TdomText.isWhitespaceInElementContent property renamed to isElementContentWhitespace.

25.09.2004
TdomEntityReference internally modified.
TdomNode (and derived classes): internally modified: Validation optimized.
TdomASModelCollection internally modified.
xmlAnalyseTag global function removed.
TXmlStandardDocReader.writeProcessingInstruction modified: The content of a Processing Instruction is now correctly parsed, i.e. whitespace at its right end is preserved.

19.09.2004
TXmlPCDATASignal.CharRefGenerated property added.
TXmlWFTestHandler.ProcessSignal modified: All character references outside the root element result in a wellformedness error now, even if resolved to whitespace.
TXmlExtSubsetTokenizer.next bug fixed. Parameter entities references are now not any longer recognized in default attribute values.
TdomDocument.CalculateNormalizedAttrValue protected function added.
TdomAttr.getValue internally modified.
TXmlASBuilder.processSignal modified.  Redundant checks removed.
TXmlASBuilder.isActive property removed.
TXmlASBuilder.processSignal modified.
TXmlInputSource.evaluateXmlOrTextDecl bug fixed.  A standalone declaration appearing in the text declaration of an external parsed entity is considered a well-formedness error, now.
TDtdToASParser: intDtdStreamToAS and extDtdStreamToAS procedure: bug fixed.
TdomDocument.validateElement: bug fixed.  CDATA sections are now allowed in 'mixed content'.
TdomASEntityModelType typed constants removed.
TdomASEntityModel class removed.
TdomASEntityModelNS class removed.
TdomASEntityDecl class re-designed.
TdomASEntityDeclNS internally modified.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.14".

18.09.2004
TXmlInputSource.evaluateXmlOrTextDecl bug fixed. Streams labeled UTF-16 are no parsed according to RFC 2781: "UTF-16, an encoding of ISO 10646", sec. 4.3.
TXmlErrorType, ET_FATAL_ERRORS, and ET_DOCTYPE_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_INVALID_ATTLIST_DECL_NAME constant added.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.WriteAttributeDeclaration: bug fixed.
TdomDocument.validateAttr bug fixed.
TXmlDtdTokenizer.next bug fixed.
TdomASModelCollection.validate bugs fixed.
TdomNode (and derived classes): validateIDREFS protected function modified.  IDREF and IDREFS validation implemented.
TdomAttr.getValue bug fixed. 
Global function normalizeSpace modified and new normalizeWhiteSpace function added.
TXmlDoctypeDeclTokenizer.next bug fixed.
TXmlStandardDtdReader internally modified.
TXmlASBuilder internally modified.
TdomDocument.validateDefaultAttr bug fixed: Violations of VC: Fixed Attribute Default (XML 1.0, § 3.3.2) are now correctly detected.
TdomASModelCollection.validate bug fixed: Violation of VC: No Duplicate Tokens (XML 1.0, § 3.3.1) are now correctly detected.
TdomNode (and derived classes): create constructor modified; ownerDocument and referenceDocument property reimplemented.
TdomXPathCustomResult is derived from TCustomOwnedNode now.  
TdomXPathCustomResult (and derived classes): create constructor internally modified.
TdomXPathNamespace.create constructor modified.

11.09.2004
TXmlStreamBuilder.writeWideString bug fixed: Byte count for character references is correct now.
TDomToXmlParser.writeToWideString bug fixed: WriteToWideString returns UTF-16LE instead of UTF-16BE, now.
TdomNode.getTextContent internally modified.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.findNextAttDef: Bug fixed. Enumeration attributes are now recognized as such.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.13".

08.08.2004
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.12".

07.08.2004
TXmlPostProcessingEvent event type added.
TXmlStandardHandler.OnSignaled event added.

TXmlProcessingEvent: Accept parameter added.
TXmlStandardHandler.OnSignal event modified.

TdomDocument.validateDefaultAttr: bug fixed.

TdomASContentModel.validateChoiceNames: bug fixed.

TdomDocument: Bugs fixed.  Thanks to Eric Zurcher for notification.

01.06.2004
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.8".

TXmlStreamBuilder.IncludeXmlDecl published property added.

TdomSerializationEvent modified.
TdomLocator and derived classes removed.  Use IdomLocator interface instead.  All occurrences in the source code changed accordingly.
TdomError modified.
TXmlInputSource modifed.

TXmlInputSource.create modified.
IdomLocator interface added.

TdomError.cloneError function added.
pcdataToStr function removed.  
strToPcdata function removed.

15.05.2004
TdomOperationType typed constants added.
TdomUserDataEvent event type added.
TdomNode (and derived classes): getUserData and setUserData methods added.
TdomDocumentTypeDecl.intSubsetPos property removed.
TdomDocument.calcPos removed.
TdomNode (and derived classes): startPos and endPos properties removed.  Applications may use setUserData and getUserData to store position information programmatically.

TdomPreparationStatus typed constants added.
TdomAutoprepare typed constants added.
TdomPERefTreatment typed constants added.
TXmlDomBuilder.AutoPrepare property added.

TXmlStandardDtdReader.parseInternalSubset function modfied.
TDtdToASParser.PERefTreatment property added.

08.05.2004
TdomEntity modified.
TdomASElementDecl.setASAttributeDecl modified.
TdomASAttributeDecl completely modified.
TdomASDataType renamed to TXmlDataType.
TdomASValueConstraint replaced by TdomAttrValueConstraint.
TdomDocumentTypeDecl.dtdModel property and prepareDtdModel function added.
TdomDocument.prepareASModels function modified.
TdomASModelCollection modified: Owner type changed from TdomDocument to TdomDocumentTypeDecl.
TdomASModel inherits from TCustomOwnedObject now.
TDomImplementation.freeUnusedASModels procedure removed.
TDomImplementation.createASModel function removed.
TdomCustomASModel renamed to TdomCustomASModelNS.
TdomDocument: ASModel methods removed. 
TdomElement.prepareAttributes function moved to the TdomDocument class.

01.05.2004
TdomElement.prepareAttributes modified: replaceFixed parameter removed.
ET_REFERENCE_TO_UNPARSED_ENTITY renamed to ET_REFERS_TO_UNPARSED_ENTITY.
ET_UNUSABLE_ENTITY_DECL removed. Use ET_NO_PROPER_MARKUP_REFERENCED instead.
TdomASModelCollection.getNormalizedValue removed.

25.04.2004 
TDomToXmlParser: events added and visibility of some methods and properties changed.
TXmlDistributor.processSignal modified: An XML Signal is passed to every registered Content Handler, no matter if a previous one has returned 'False'.
TXmlWFTestContentHandler and TXmlWFTestDTDHandler merged into new TXmlWFTestHandler.
TdomASModelCollection internally modified.

24.04.2004
TXmlProcessingEvent class added.
TXmlProcessingObject and derived classes added. TXmlCustomHandler and derived classes complete redesigned to use TXmlProcessingObjects instead of individual function calls. (See manual for details.)
TXmlCustomDTDHandler class removed.
TXmlCustomContentHandler class removed.
TXmlWFTestContentHandler directly inherits from TXmlCustomHandler, now.
TXmlWFTestDtdHandler directly inherits from TXmlCustomHandler, now.
TXmlDomBuilder directly inherits from TXmlCustomHandler, now.
TXmlASBuilder directly inherits from TXmlCustomHandler, now.
TXmlWFTestContentHandler.TestPrefixMapping property added.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.prepare procedure added.
TXmlErrorType, ET_WARNINGS: ET_DOUBLE_ATTLISTDECL constant added.
TdomPERepository modified.
TdomParameterEntityInfoObject renamed to TdomPEInfoObject and  modified.
TdomElement.resolveEntityReferences bug fixed.
TdomNode.resolveEntityReferences (and derived classes) modified.
TResolveResourceEvent renamed to TdomResolveResourceEvent.
TdomPieceType: xmlParameterEntityDecl, xmlXmlDeclaration, xmlTextDeclaration constants added.

18.04.2004
TXmlStreamBuilder: byteCount, characterCount, columnCount, lineFeedCount, and tabCount properties added.

17.04.2004
TdomNode (and derived classes): level property added.
TdomNode (and derived classes): absoluteIndex property added.
TXmlProcessorEvent8 class removed.  TXmlProcessorEvent15 class renamed to TXmlProcessorEvent8.  TXmlCustomHandler.OnStartDocument adjusted accordingly.

11.04.2004
TDomToXmlParser.writeToString modified.  Allows now also multi-byte encodings to be serialized into a string.
TXmlTranscoder class added.

10.04.2004
TDomImplementation.errorEventsDisabled property, and disableErrorEvents and enableErrorEvents procedures added.

03.04.2004
TXmlStandardDomReader.parseloop internally modified.
TXmlToDomParser.ParseXmlInputSource added.
TXmlInputSource partly refactored and interface modified.
TdomError.create constructor modified.

28.03.2004
TXmlCustomHandler (and derived classes): startDocument and startExtDtd functions modified: inputEnc parameter added.  Other classes internally modified accordingly.
TdomNewLineType class of constants removed.  Use TCodecLFTrans definied in cUnicodeCodecs.pas instead.
TXmlOutputSource modified.
TDomToXmlParser.newLine property changed to LFOutputOpt.

21.03.2004
writeWideString procedure removed.
writeWideStrings procedure removed.
writeWideChars procedure removed.
TXmlOutputSource: writeCDATA  and writePCDATA procedures removed, writeUCS4Char procedure added instead.
TXmlStreamBuilder internally modified.
TXmlDocBuilder renamed to TXmlDomBuilder.

20.03.2004
TXmlStreamBuilder.writeByteOrderMark: Bug fixed (UTF-8 BOM was wrong).  Thanks to Paolo Salvan for notification.
TdomDocument: encoding, standalone and version properties renamed to xmlEncoding, xmlStandalone and xmlVersion (in accordance with W3C's latest DOM 3 draft).  Other methods internally changed accordingly.
TXmlInputSource: invalidEncodingSpecified, encodingName, standalone and versionNumber properties renamed to invalidEncoding, xmlEncoding, xmlStandalone and xmlVersion.  Other methods internally changed accordingly. 
TdomDocument.inputEncoding property added.
TXmlStreamBuilder.currentEncoding property added.
TXmlDocBuilder.startDocumentFragment modified: Calling startDocumentFragment with a TdomDocument node as the reference node of the Builder no longer modifies the documentUri, xmlencoding, xmlStandalone and xmlVersion properties of the reference Document node.
TXmlCustomHandler.startDocumentFragment (and dervied classes): versionName and sdDl parameters removed. Other methods internally changed accordingly.
TXmlStandardHandler.OnStartDocumentFragment is of type TXmlProcessorEvent2, now. Other methods internally changed accordingly.
TXmlStandardDomReader.parse modified.

13.03.2004
pcdataToStr and strToPcdata function modified.
TXmlStreamBuilder modified.
TXmlOutputSource modified.

23.01.2004
TXmlOutputSource.writeCDATA bug fixed.
TXmlOutputSource.writePCDATA bug fixed.
TXmlStandardDomReader.parse and TXmlStreamBuilder.startDocument modified: Inserting a LF after the XML declaration is now the job of the TXmlStandardDomReader.

10.01.2004
TXmlStreamBuilder modified, so that each item outside the document element tree is serialized in a new line.  TdomDocument.calcPos modified accordingly.

04.01.2004
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.7".

03.01.2004
TdomDocumentTypeDecl.intSubsetPos property added.
TDtdToASParser.parseDTD function added.
TXmlInputSource.create constructor modified.
TDomImplementation.TabWidth property added.  TabWidth properties and parameters (or equivalents) removed from other classes and methods.

01.01.2004
TXmlCustomHandler (and derived classes): ResolvePE functions removed.
TXmlASBuilder: parameterEntities property removed.
TXmlASBuilder.parameterEntityDeclaration internally modified.
All Content Model related classes and methods removed.  Use Abstract Schema Model classes and methods instead.
TXmlCustomDtdParser removed.
TDtdToASParser inherits directly from TXmlCustomParser, now.
TDtdToASParser modified.
TXmlCustomHandler: Parsing events moved to TXmlStandardHandler (affects also derived classes).
TXmlCustomContentHandler directly derived from TXmlCustomHandler.  As a consequence no parsing events are triggered anymore in this or in a derived class.  Use TxmlStandardHandler object in your parsing pipeline to trigger events.
TXmlWFTestContentHandler.nextHandler property added.
TXmlCustomDtdHandler directly derived from TXmlCustomHandler.  As a consequence no parsing events are triggered anymore in this or in a derived class.  Use TxmlStandardHandler object in your parsing pipeline to trigger events.
TXmlWFTestDTDHandler.nextHandler property added.
TXmlCustomReader (and derived classes): nextHandler property changed to type TXmlCustomHandler. 
TXmlStreamBuilder directly derived from TXmlCustomHandler.  As a consequence no parsing events are triggered anymore in this or in a derived class.  Use TxmlStandardHandler object in your parsing pipeline to trigger events. 

28.12.2003
TXmlInputSource: visibility of BufSize property changed to public.
TXmlOutputSource: visibility of BufSize property changed to public.
TdomPERepository class added.
TdomParameterEntityInfoObject.entityURI function added.
TXmlDtdTokenType class of constants added.
TXmlDtdAbstractTokenType class of constants added.
TXmlDtdTokenizer class added.
TXmlCustomSubsetTokenizer class added.
TXmlExtSubsetTokenizer class added.
TXmlIntSubsetTokenizer class added.
TXmlStandardDtdReader completely re-written.
TXmlCustomDtdParser internally modified.
TDtdToASParser modified.
TDtdToCMParser modified.
TdomDocument.prepareASModels internally modified.
TdomASEntityDecl.establishUsability internally modified.
TdomASEntityDeclNS.establishUsability internally modified.

21.12.2003
TXmlTokenizer renamed to TXmlDocTokenizer.
TXmlTokenType renamed to TXmlDocTokenType.
TXmlStandardDocReader.parse2 internally modified.
TXmlErrorType, ET_FATAL_ERRORS, and ET_DOCTYPE_FATAL_ERRORS: ET_ATTLIST_DECL_START_EXPECTED, ET_CONDITIONAL_SECTION_NOT_ALLOWED, ET_ELEMENT_DECL_START_EXPECTED, ET_ENTITY_DECL_START_EXPECTED, ET_NOTATION_DECL_START_EXPECTED, ET_WHITESPACE_EXPECTED, ET_INVALID_MARKUP_DECL, ET_INVALID_PARAMETER_ENTITY_DECL, ET_UNCLOSED_ATTLIST_DECL, ET_UNCLOSED_CONDITIONAL_SECTION, ET_UNCLOSED_ELEMENT_DECL, ET_UNCLOSED_ENTITY_DECL, ET_UNCLOSED_NOTATION_DECL and ET_UNCLOSED_PARAMETER_ENTITY_REF constant added.

30.11.2003
TdomError: language, message, and supportedLanguages properties removed.  Use new add-on XDOM_error_reporting unit instead.
TdomError: createFromError constructor added.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.6".

29.11.2003
TdomASElementDecl.destroy: Bug fixed.  Thanks to Torsten Munkelt for notification.
TXmlToDomParser.parseStream bug fixed.
xmlAnalysePCDATA helper function removed.
TdomDocument.calcPos added.
TdomNode (and derived classes): startPos, endPos properties added.

23.11.2003
TdomASContentModel.validateNames: bug fixed.

15.11.2003
TXmlToDomParser completely re-written.  Check out the manual for details.
TXmlSourceCode.text function added.
TXmlCustomDtdParser.create internally modified.
TCMToASParser.create internally modified.
TDtdToASParser.create and destroy internally modified.
TDtdToCMParser.create internally modified.
TDomToXmlParser.create internally modified.
TCMToXmlParser.create internally modified.
TdomDocument.prepareASModels internally modified.
TdomDocument.systemId property renamed to documentUri.
TdomDocument.setBaseUri procedure removed. Use documentUri property instead.
TDomImplementation.createDoc modified.
TDomImplementation.getDocInstance modified.
TResolveResourceEvent added.
TXmlParserEvent removed. Use TResolveResourceEvent instead.
TXmlParserAction removed.
TCustomResourceResolver class added.
TStandardResourceResolver class added.
TDomImplementation.ResourceResolver published property added.
TDomImplementation.OnExternalParsedEntity event removed. Use a ResourceResolver component instead.
TDomImplementation.resolveResource added.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.5".

19.10.2003
TXmlTokenizer class added.
TXmlStandardDocReader totally re-written.
TXmlErrorType: ET_CDATA_START_EXPECTED, ET_COMMENT_START_EXPECTED, ET_DOCTYPE_START_EXPECTED, ET_DOUBLE_HYPHEN_IN_COMMENT, ET_HYPHEN_AT_COMMENT_END, ET_MISSING_ELEMENT_NAME, ET_MISSING_ENTITY_NAME, ET_UNCLOSED_CDATA_SECTION, ET_UNCLOSED_CHARREF, ET_UNCLOSED_COMMENT, ET_UNCLOSED_DOCTYPE, ET_UNCLOSED_ELEMENT, ET_UNCLOSED_ENTITY_REF, ET_UNCLOSED_PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION added.

18.10.2003
TdomCMNotationDeclaration: systemId property renamed to sysId, publicId property renamed to pubId.
TdomCMNode.systemId property added.
TdomReaderLocator.uri and TdomCMReaderLocator modified: The URI is now automatically adopted from the parent Reader.
TXmlStandardDomReader and TXmlStandardCMReader modified: The related node information of its locator now refers to the current context node.
TXmlWFTestContentHandler.PCDATA bug fixed.
TXmlInputSource.evaluateXmlOrTextDecl bug fixed.

20.09.2003
The functions for testing XML rules have been moved to a separate XmlRulesUtils unit included in the "Open XML Utilities" package.
The ISO 639 / RFC 3066 Language Code Processing functions have been moved to the LangUtils unit contained in the Open XML Utilities package.
translateWideString function moved to the WideStrUtils unit contained in the Open XML Utilities package. 
Bug in the XPath number result treatment under Delphi 5 fixed.  Thanks to Jakob Jünger for notification.
Bug fixed: TdomDocument and TDomImplementation: OnAttrModified event is now also fired, when the attribute value is directly changed via setting its nodeValue property. TdomDocument.modified fixed accordingly.  Thanks to Jakob Jünger for notification.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.4".

14.09.2003
TdomXPathSnapshotResult renamed to TdomXPathNodeSetResult.
TdomXPathResultType: XPATH_NODE_SNAPSHOT_TYPE constant renamed to XPATH_NODE_SET_TYPE.
TdomXPathResult renamed to TdomXPathCustomResult.
TdomXPathResultClass metaclass added.
TdomRequestXPathFunctionResultEvent event type added.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.3".

13.09.2003
TdomXPathSyntaxTree class added.
TdomXPathSyntaxNode (and derived classes): create constructor modified.
TdomXPathExpression class was completely modified, renamed to TXPathExpression and is now a component.
TdomXPathResult and derived classes: completely modified.
TdomNode.evaluate method removed. Use TdomXPathExpression.evaluate instead.
TdomNode.evaluateToDouble internally modified and renamed to evaluateToNumber.
TdomNode: evaluateToBoolean, evaluateToNode, and evaluateToWideString internally modified.

07.09.2003
TXmlStandardDomReader.contextNode property added.
TXmlStandardCMReader.contextNode property added.
TdomReaderLocator class added.
TdomCMReaderLocator class added.
TXmlStandardCMReader.parseloop method internally modified.
TXmlStandardDomReader.parse and parseloop method internally modified.
Throughout XDOM: Declarations for unmodified string parameter changed to "const" to improve parsing performance.  Thanks to Ivan Kossey for notification.
TdomDocument.createExpression() function removed. Instead, use the constructor of TdomXPathExpression directly.
TdomXPathExpression: ownerDocument property removed. Instead, use the ownerDocument property of the expression's context node property to access information about the document currently associated with an TdomXPathExpression object.  
TdomXPathExpression: Setting the contextNode property does no longer raise a EWrong_Document_Err exception.
TdomNode.evaluateToNode internally modified.
TdomXPathExpression: expression property added.

06.09.2003
TdomNode.expandedName property added.
normalizeSpace function added.
translateWideString function added.
isSubLanguage function added.
TdomNode (and derived classes): XPathStringValue property bug fixed.
TdomNode (and derived classes): language property added.
TdomNode.getBaseUri internally modified.
TdomNode (and derived classes): evaluateToNode(), evaluateToWideString(), evaluateToBoolean(), evaluateToDouble() functions added.
EXPath_Invalid_Function_Call_Err exception added.
XPathRound function added.
XPathWideStringToNumber function added.
XPath function library implemented (see the manual for details).
TXmlDocBuilder.KeepDocumentTypeDecl property added.
TXmlDocBuilder.doctype function modified.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.2".

31.08.2003
Several XPath methods have been modified to provide full IEEE 754 number support.
TdomNode: Method binding of several methods inherited from TCustomOwnedNode changed from virtual to override.
TdomNode and TdomCMNode (and derived classes): reintroduce directive added to declaration of getFirstChild, getLastChild, getNextSibling, getPreviousSibling, hasAsAncestor, and insertBefore.
TdomDocument.getDoctypeDecl internally modified.
TdomRequestXPathVariableEvent event class added.
TDomImplementation.OnRequestXPathVariable event added.
TdomXPathFunctionCall modified: arguments property added.
TdomXPathArgument class removed.
TdomXPathSyntaxNode (and derived classes): evaluate function modified.
TdomXPathEqualityExpr class added.
TdomXPathRelationalExpr class added.
TdomXPathAdditiveExpr class added.
TdomXPathMultiplicativeExpr class added.
TdomXPathSyntaxNode descandant class hierarchy modified.

30.08.2003
TdomNodeIterator internally modified.
TdomNode.Prefix: Default behavior on setting changed. An ENo_Modification_Allowed_Err is raised now if the node is readonly.
TdomXPathAxisNameAttribute.getAxisNodeSnapshot bug fixed: Namespace declaration attributes are no longer accepted.
TdomXPathNamespace completely modified.
TdomXPathSnapshotResult modified: Attached TdomXPathNamespace nodes are automatically freed.
TdomXPathAxisNameNamespace.getAxisNodeSnapshot implemented.

24.08.2003
TdomDocument: appendChild, insertBefore, replaceChild modified. There is no longer an EInvalid_Character_Err raised if the name of the document type declaration differs from the name of the document element.
TdomNode (and derived classes): lookupNamespaceUri function added.
TdomXPathNSResolver class removed. Instead, use the TdomNode.lookupNamespaceUri() function to resolve a namespace prefix.
TdomDocument.createExpression method modified.
TdomDocument.createNSResolver and freeNSResolver methods removed.
TdomXPathExpression: create() and evaluate() methods modified. ContextNode property added.
TdomXPathSyntaxNode (and derived classes): create, destroy, evaluate() and evaluate2() functions modified; ownerXPathExpression property added.
TdomXPathExpression and TdomXPathSyntaxNode are now derived from TCustomOwnedObject, which is specified in TreeUtils.pas.
TdomXPathExpression: ownerDocument property added.

03.08.2003
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 3.1.1".

27.07.2003
Used unit UnicodeConv replaced by UnicodeUtils.

14.06.2003
TdomError: create constructor modified and createFromLocator constructor internally modified.
TdomLocator and derived classes: offset property removed, create constructor modified and several other functions internally modified. 

08.06.2003
TXmlInputSource totally modified.
TXmlOutputSource modified.

01.06.2003
All ABNF helper functions outsourced into AbnfUtils.pas.
All routines for URI testing and processing outsourced into UriUtils.pas.
Some routines for wideString processing outsourced into WideStrUtils.pas.
TdomCustomReader and TdomCustomWriter outsourced into ParserUtils.pas.
TXmlBOMType typed constants added.

25.05.2003
TdomNodeEvent class added.
TdomDocument internally modified.
TdomIterator internally modified.

18.05.2003
TdomNotifyNodeEvent added.
TdomNodeModifiedEvent removed.
TdomNodeModifiedDocEvent removed.
TdomAttrModifiedDocEvent removed.
TdomDocument: OnAttrModified, OnCharacterDataModified, OnNodeClearing, OnNodeInserted, OnNodeRemoving added.
TdomNode: OnAttrModified, OnCharacterDataModified, OnNodeInserted, OnNodeInsertedIntoDocument, OnNodeRemoved, OnNodeRemovedFromDocument removed. Use the corresponding TdomDocument events.
TDomImplementation: OnNodeRemoved modified and renamed to OnNodeRemoving; OnAttrModified, OnCharacterDataModified, OnNodeInserted modified; OnNodeClearing added.

17.05.2003
TdomDocument.create modified. The ownerDocument of TdomDocument is always nil, now.
TdomDocument.referenceDocument property added.
domASModelCollection.add internally modified.
TdomASModelCollectionNS.add internally modified.
TdomAttr internally modified.
TdomNode.isAncestor renamed to hasAsAncestor.

TdomNamedCMNodeMap internally modified.
TdomSpecialNodeList class removed.
TdomAttr internally modified.
TdomElement.removeAttributeNode internally modified.

TDomImplementation.createDoc() added.
Support for registered document classes has beend removed.  This includes the TdomDocumentClass, PdomDocumentFormat and TdomDocumentFormat types as well as TDomImplementation.registerDocumentFormat(), TDomImplementation.supportsDocumentFormat(), TDomImplementation.unregisterDocumentClass() and the TDomImplementation.defaultDocumentClass property.

TdomCMObject.validate function internally modified.

TdomElement.validate2 bug fixed.  Thanks to Ernst van der Pols for notification.
TdomDocumentTypeDecl class added.
TdomNodeType: ntDocument_Type_Decl_Node constant added.
TdomNode.create, TdomDocument.prepareASModels, TdomDocument.replaceChild, TdomDocument.validate and all parser classes modified to support TdomDocumentTypeDecl instead of TdomDocumentType.
TdomNode.getBaseUri, TdomElement.validate2 modified to support TdomDocumentTypeDecl.
TdomDocumentFragment.create modified.  TdomDocumentFragment no longer accepts TdomDocumentType objects as child nodes.
TdomDocument.create, TdomDocument.appendChild, TdomDocument.insertBefore, TdomDocument.replaceChild modified.  TdomDocument no longer accepts a TdomDocumentType objects as child node.  Instead it a TdomDocumentTypeDecl objects is allowed.
TdomDocument.doctype property modified.

TdomDocument.createDocumentType replaced by TdomDocument.createDocumentTypeDecl.

22.08.2002

06.08.2002
Bug related to parameter entity references in the external subset fixed (thanks to Marc Geldon for notification):
TXmlDtdBuilder.resolveCharRefsAndPERefs internally modified.
TXmlCMBuilder.resolveCharRefsAndPERefs internally modified.
TXmlStandardDtdReader.parseExternalSubset internally modified.
TXmlDtdBuilder.parameterEntityRef modified.  Now, it is only allowed to call it when the internal subset of a DTD is being parsed.

05.08.2002
Several minor adaptations to changes in UnicodeConv.pas.
TXmlStreamBuilder totally re-written.
TDomToXmlParser.BufferSize property added.
TDomToXmlParser.writeToStream internally modified.
TCMToXmlParser.BufferSize property added.
TCMToXmlParser.writeToStream internally modified.
TXmlCustomHandler and derived classes: charRef function and OnCharRef event removed. Use the PCDATA function instead.
TXmlWFTestContentHandler.PCDATA modified.  No more test for '<' and '&'.
TXmlCustomDomReader.parseloop internally modified.
TXmlStandardDocReader.parse internally modified.

03.08.2002
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 2.3.28".
XDOM Structure Model changed: TdomAttr does no longer has child nodes. 
Overriding function TdomAttr.GetNodeValue removed.  TdomAttr.GetNodeValue inherits now from TdomNode.GetNodeValue.
Overriding function TdomAttr.SetNodeValue removed.  TdomAttr.SetNodeValue inherits now from TdomNode.SetNodeValue.
Overriding function TdomAttr.normalize removed.  TdomAttr.normalize inherits now from TdomNode.normalize.
TdomAttr.literalValue property is now read/write.
TdomAttr.value property is now readonly and returns the attribute's normalized value.
TdomElement.setAttribute modified.
TdomElement.setAttributeNS modified.
TdomElement.validate2 internally modified.
TdomDocument.importNode internally modified.
TDomImplementation.OnAttributeModified and TdomNode.OnAttributeModified events modified: The prevValue and newValue parameter now signify the literal attribute value.
TdomElement.getAttribute replaced by getAttributeLiteralValue and getAttributeNormalizedValue.
TdomElement.getAttributeNS replaced by getAttributeNSLiteralValue and getAttributeNSNormalizedValue.
TdomNode (and derived classes): resolveEntityReferences modified.
TdomEntityReference.resolveEntityReferences removed.  TdomEntityReference.resolveEntityReferences inherits now from TdomNode.resolveEntityReferences.
TdomAttr.resolveEntityReferences removed.  TdomAttr.resolveEntityReferences inherits now from TdomNode.resolveEntityReferences.
TdomElement.resolveEntityReferences internally modified.
TdomDocumentFragment.resolveEntityReferences added.
TdomDocument.GetDocumentElement internally modified.
TXmlDocBuilder.startElement modified.

02.08.2002
TdomText.literalValue property removed.
xmlReplaceSpecialCharacters function removed.
TXmlDocBuilder.startElement(), TdomAttr.resolveEntityReferences(), TdomAttr.getLiteralValue() and TXmlStreamBuilder.startElement() modified to fix special character bug reported by Marc Parenteau.

31.07.2002
TdomNode (and derived classes): writeCode(), code removed.
TdomDocument: writeCodeAsUTF8(), writeCodeAsUTF16(), codeAsString, codeAsWideString removed.
TdomCMNode (and derived classes): writeCode(), code removed.
Use the new TDomToXmlParser, TCMToXmlParser and TXmlStreamBuilder components to replace the removed functions.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 2.3.27".

TXmlToDomParser.processIntDtdString internally modified.
TXmlToDomParser.docMemoryToDom removed.  Use docStringToDom or docWideStringToDom instead.
TXmlToDomParser.extDtdMemoryToDom removed.  Use extDtdStringToDom or extDtdWideStringToDom instead.
TXmlToDomParser.intDtdMemoryToDom removed.  Use intDtdStringToDom or intDtdWideStringToDom instead.
TXmlToDomParser.memoryToDom removed.  Use stringToDom or wideStringToDom instead.
TXmlMemoryStream removed. Use TdomWideStringStream instead.

TXmlStandardDocReader.parse internally modified.

03.02.2002
TdomDocument.importNode modified:  If the 'importedNode' parameter is nil an ENot_Supported_Err is raised, now.

02.02.2002

IsXmlCData: bug fixed: Last character is evaluated, now.

31.01.2002
TdomASModel.attributeDecls property added.
TdomASModel.container property added.
TdomASModel.contentModelDecls property added.
TdomAsModel: 'publicId' property renamed to 'hint'.
TdomAsModel: 'systemId' property renamed to 'location'.
TdomASNode renamed to TdomASObject.
TdomASNodeType renamed to TdomASObjectType.
TdomASNodeTypeSet renamed to TdomASObjectTypeSet.
TdomASNodeList renamed to TdomASObjectList.
TdomASNamedNodeMap renamed to TdomASNamedObjectMap.
TdomASObjectType modfied.
TdomASObject: 'nodeName' property renamed to 'ASObjectName'.
TdomASObject: 'nodeType' property renamed to 'ASObjectType'.
TdomASModel: 'freeAllNodes' method renamed to 'freeAllASObjects'.
TdomASObject inherits from TdomASObject, now.

28.01.2002
TdomASUsageLocation replaced by TdomASModelType.
TdomASModel: property 'usageLocation' replaced by 'usage'.

25.01.2002
TXmlToDomParser: OnExternalSubset event removed.  Now, the parser uses the OnExternalParsedEntity event of its attached TDomImplementation object to request an input source.
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 2.3.20".

24.01.2002
function isXmlChars: bug fixed.  Last character is now tested, too
function isXmlEntityValueChars: bug fixed.  Last character is now tested, too
function isXmlSystemChars: bug fixed.  Last character is now tested, too

22.01.2002
Internal method XMLAnalyseAttrSequence() modified:  It does not longer raise exceptions; instead it returns a TXmlErrorType. 
TXmlInputSource.getEncodingType internally modified.
EDuplicate_Name_Err, EInvalid_Character_Err, ENo_AS_Available, EType_Err, EValidation_Err, and EWrong_Mime_Type_Err exception classes added.

20.01.2002
TXmlErrorType, TXmlErrorTypes, ET_WARNINGS, ET_ERRORS, ET_FATAL_ERRORS, ET_DOCTYPE_FATAL_ERRORS, ET_NAMESPACE_FATAL_ERRORS added.
EParserException descendants replaced by TXmlErrorType constants and sets.  The only remaining EParserException inherits from EDomException, now.

19.01.2002
isXmlEntityValueChars bug fixed: treatment of "&amp;" corrected.  Thanks to Ahmed Knorn for notification.

16.01.2002
TdomCMObject.prepare changed from procedure to function.
TdomCustomErrorHandler removed.
TdomStandardErrorHandler removed.
All validation procedures modified.
TXmlToDomParser internally modified.
TXmlStandardProcessorAgent removed: functionality integrated in protected methods of TXmlToDomParser.
TdomCMParameterEntity and associated factory and clone methods  removed.
ctParameterEntity constant removed.

15.01.2002
TdomImplementation modified: OnError event and handleError() function added.
TXmlDtdBuilder.parameterEntityDeclaration internally modified.
TXmlCMBuilder.entityDeclaration internally modified.
TXmlCMBuilder.parameterEntityDeclaration internally modified.
TXmlCustomDTDHandler internally modified: protected function parserErrorFactory() removed.  All references in the sources replaced with TdomError.createFromLocator calls.
TXmlCustomContentHandler internally modified: protected function parserErrorFactory() removed.  All references in the sources replaced with TdomError.createFromLocator calls.
TXmlCustomReader internally modified: protected function parserErrorFactory() removed.  All references in other classes internally replaced with TdomError.createFromLocator calls.
TXmlCustomReader modified: DOMImpl property added, OnError, OnFatalError, and OnWarning events removed (applies on derived classes, too).
TXmlCustomParser modified: DOMImpl property added (applies on derived classes, too).
TXmlStandardDocReader modified.
TXmlStandardDtdReader modified.
TXmlStandardDomReader modified.
TXmlStandardCMReader modified.
TXmlCustomHandler and derived classes:  'Sender' parameters of type TXmlCustomProcessorAgent replaced by parameters of type TXmlCustomReader, OnError, OnFatalError, and OnWarning events removed.
TXmlProcessorEvent.. type declarations: 'processorAgent' parameters of type TXmlCustomProcessorAgent replaced by 'reader' parameters of type TXmlCustomReader.
TXmlCustomProcessorAgent removed. Now, TXmlStandardProcessorAgent inherits directly from TComponent.
TXmlToDomParser modified: OnError, OnFatalError, and OnWarning events removed.
TXmlCMAnalyzer modified: OnError, OnFatalError, and OnWarning events removed.
TXmlProcessorErrorEvent removed.
TXmlToDomParserErrorEvent removed.
TXmlCustomHandler modified: Type of the return value of all functions changed from TdomError to boolean (applies on derived classes, too).

14.01.2002
TdomCustomParser replaced by TXmlCustomParser.
TdomDtdAnalyzer replaced by TXmlCMAnalyzer which inherits from TXmlCustomParser.
TXmlToDomParser inherits from TXmlCustomParser, now.
TXmlToDomParserErrorEvent: parameter xmlToDomParser changed from type TXmlToDomParser to type TXmlCustomParser.
TdomStandardContentModelReader removed.
TdomStandardExtSubsetXMLReader removed.
TdomStandardIntSubsetXMLReader removed.
TdomCustomContentHandler removed.
TdomCustomDtdHandler removed.
TdomDTDContentModelHandler removed.
TdomStandardExtSubsetBuilder removed.
TdomStandardIntSubsetBuilder removed.
TdomStandardLocator replaced by TdomLocator.  All references in the sources replaced accordingly.
TXmlParserError replaced by TdomError.  All references in the sources replaced accordingly.
TdomInputSourceLocator added.  TXmlInputSource modified to cooperate with it.
TXmlErrorType replaced by TdomSeverity.  All references in the sources replaced accordingly.
TdomErrorEvent added.

13.01.2002
The following classes were moved from XDOM_2_3.pas into UnicodeConv.pas: TdomEncodingType, EConversionStream, TConversionStream, TUTF16BEToUTF8Stream.
The following functions were moved from XDOM_2_3.pas into UnicodeConv.pas: Iso8859_1ToUTF16Char,  Iso8859_2ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_3ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_4ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_5ToUTF16Char,  Iso8859_6ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_7ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_8ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_9ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_10ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_13ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_14ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_15ToUTF16Char, KOI8_RToUTF16Char, cp10000_MacRomanToUTF16Char, cp1250ToUTF16Char, cp1251ToUTF16Char, cp1252ToUTF16Char, Iso8859_1ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_2ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_3ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_4ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_5ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_6ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_7ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_8ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_9ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_10ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_13ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_14ToUTF16Str, Iso8859_15ToUTF16Str, KOI8_RToUTF16Str, cp10000_MacRomanToUTF16Str, cp1250ToUTF16Str, cp1251ToUTF16Str, cp1252ToUTF16Str, UTF8ToUTF16BEStr, UTF16BEToUTF8Str, UTF16To7BitASCIIChar, UTF16ToIso8859_1Char, UTF16To7BitASCIIStr, UTF16ToIso8859_1Str, UTF16HighSurrogate, UTF16LowSurrogate, UTF16SurrogateToInt, IsUTF16HighSurrogate, IsUTF16LowSurrogate.

10.01.2002
All resourcestrings were moved from the interface to the implementation section of the unit.

UTF16To7BitASCIIChar bug fixed: Text of exception message corrected.
function UTF16ToIso8859_1Char amd UTF16ToIso8859_1Str added.
function trimWhitespace, trimWhitespaceLeft, and trimWhitespaceRight added.

30.12.2001
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 2.3.19".

29.12.2001
TXmlParserLanguage renamed to TIso639LanguageCode.  Now, this class contains all language codes defined in ISO 639.

TXmlParserError.getErrorStr() redefined to use TIso639LanguageCode.

20.12.2001
TdomTreePosition class added.
TdomNode (and derived classes): compareTreePosition() function added.

18.12.2001
TXmlToDomParser modified.  Now, the following functions raise an EParserException if a violation of a well-formdness constraint is detected: fileToDom(), memroyToDom(), streamToDom(), stringToDom(), wideStringToDom(), docMemoryToDom(), docSourceCodeToDom(), docStreamToDom(), docStringToDom(), docWideStringToDom(), extDtdMemoryToDom(), extDtdSourceCodeToDom(), extDtdStreamToDom(), extDtdStringToDom(), extDtdWideStringToDom(), intDtdMemoryToDom(), intDtdSourceCodeToDom(), intDtdStreamToDom(), intDtdStringToDom(), intDtdWideStringToDom().
XMLIsolateQuote internally modified.
XMLAnalysePubSysId internally modified.
isXmlPubidChars added.
isXmlSystemChars added.
isXmlSystemLiteral internally modified.
isXmlPubidLiteral internally modified.
All isXmlPubidLiteral() calls replaced by equivalent isXmlPubidChars() calls.
xmlIsolateQuote modified and some related isXMLSystemLiteral() calls removed.
TXmlWFTestContentHandler.doctype: bug fixed: Invalid System Literals are detected correctly, now.
isXmlChars internally modified.
TdomNotation.create bug fixed: Invalid SystemIds and PubIds are detected correctly, now.
TdomCMNotation.create bug fixed: Invalid SystemIds and PubIds are detected correctly, now.
TdomCMNotationDeclaration.create bug fixed: Invalid SystemIds and PubIds are detected correctly, now.
IsXmlEntityValueChars added.
All isXmlEntityValue() calls replaced by equivalent IsXmlEntityValueChars() calls.
XMLAnalyseAttrSequence internally modified.

17.12.2001
TdomCMEntity.calculateReplacementText: bug fixed.
Private function TdomCMEntity.refersToXyz: bug fixed.
TdomCMEntity.normalizedValue bug fixed.  Now, if the corresponding entity is external an exception is raised.
TdomCMEntity.resolvedValue (and private function getResolvedValue) removed.

Release of "Extended Document Object Model 2.3.18".

filenameToUriStr function added.

10.12.2001
TXmlInputSource.getEncodingType bug fixed.  Now, XDOM correctly identifies Windows-1252 encoding type.  Thanks to Bogdan Krusinski for notification.
Declaration of PString and PWideString class removed, since they are no longer used in XDOM.
TDomImplementation.xdomVersion property added.  It returns the current XDOM version number.  Obviousely it will be modified for each new XDOM version which therefore will not be always recorded here.
TXmlStandardDocReader.WriteDoctype internally modified.
TXmlToDomParser.OnExternalSubset internally modified (private function setOnExternalSubset used to set the value).
TdomCustomCMIEObject and derived classes: publicId and systemId property are now read/write.
TXmlDtdBuilder.startExtDtd internally modified.
TXmlDtdBuilder.startIntDtd internally modified.
TdomCMEntity.replacementText modified to conform to [XML 1.0 Errata], erratum 7.
TdomElement.resolveEntityReferences bug fixed.  Thanks to Erik van der Poll for notification.
TdomEntityReference.expand bug fixed.  Thanks to Erik van der Poll for notification.

09.08.2001
TdomWideStringList added.
(Almost) all occurences of TStringList switched to TdomWideStringList.

01.08.2001
function isXmlNames and isXmlNmtokens changed according to XML 2nd. ed. erratum 20.
Document validation functions have been modified to conform to XML 2nd. ed. erratum 15 (with one exception: elements declared EMPTY which contain an entity reference which resolves into an empty string are treated as if they are conforming to VC: "Element Valid").

24.07.2001
TdomDocument.importNode and TdomNode.cloneNode are now able to correctly duplicate namespace Elements and Attributes.

13.07.2001
TdomDocument protected function duplicateNode() removed.  Use importNode() instead.

12.07.2001
TXmlDocBuilder.startElement bug fixed.  If FBuildNamespaceTree is set to 'true', the prefix 'xml' is now automatically bound to 'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'.

11.06.2001
TdomDTDContentModelHandler.insertChildrenContent bug fixed:  In an Element declaration <!ELEMENT foo (bar)> the one element type term "(bar)" is now rated as a Sequence Particle and no longer as a Choice Particle (cf. XML 1.0 spec, 2nd ed., prod. [49] and [50]).
Release of "Extended Document Object Model 2.3.13".
